publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3449 Fiona Hyslop: Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian)—That the Parliament notes with serious concern that the Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (DPHS) has announced that it will need to close on 31 December 2002 owing to a lack of financial support from City of Edinburgh Council; notes that this service is internationally renowned; recalls that cross-party support was expressed for DPHS, including the support of ministers, and therefore urges the Scottish Executive to consider securing properly the future funding of DPHS and extending the service to other areas of the country in order to ensure that strategies to improve equality can help deliver services to those that need them.Supported by: Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Robert Brown*

S1M-3449 Fiona Hyslop: Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian)—That the Parliament notes with serious concern that the Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (DPHS) has announced that it will need to close on 31 December 2002 owing to a lack of financial support from City of Edinburgh Council; notes that this service is internationally renowned; recalls that cross-party support was expressed for DPHS, including the support of ministers, and therefore urges the Scottish Executive to consider securing properly the future funding of DPHS and extending the service to other areas of the country in order to ensure that strategies to improve equality can help deliver services to those that need them.Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson, Robert Brown
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Dennis Canavan*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*, Bruce Crawford*, Robin Harper*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Fiona McLeod*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Shona Robison*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Andrew Wilson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Irene McGugan*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Mr Murray Tosh*
S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Michael Russell*

S1M-3449 Disabled Persons Housing Service (Lothian) (lodged on 1 October 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Fergus Ewing*, Ian Jenkins*
